attributes.action: provide our armed forces better equipment so that they can carry out their job effectively.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our armed forces are taking heavy loses in the campaign against the afghanistan taliban. Most of these loses could be averted by the proivision of better equipment such as helicopters and/ or more heavily armed vehicles.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
